bibl.title: The basileis of Axum: Lexicon of the Greek Axumite Epigraphic Documents. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Lexicon of the words, terms and names, found in the Greek inscriptions of Axum. It is the first part of a series of studies on African-Greek terminology, and will be followed by a lexicon of Nubian Greek.

bibl.title: Journal of Oriental and African Studies

bibl.seg: HENDRICKX Benjamin, The basileis of Axum: Lexicon of the Greek Axumite Epigraphic Documents. Avec résumé en anglais.
Journal of Oriental and African Studies 12 (2003) pp. 1-25.

Lexicon of the words, terms and names, found in the Greek inscriptions of Axum. It is the first part of a series of studies on African-Greek terminology, and will be followed by a lexicon of Nubian Greek.
